title: VR Space Explorer
shortDescription: VR experience exploring our solar system with educational content.
overview: VR Space Explorer takes players on an educational journey through our solar system with realistic planetary physics and interactive educational content. Developed using Unreal Engine with a focus on VR immersion.
challenges: Optimizing the VR experience for consistent 90fps on mid-range hardware was challenging. We developed custom shaders and implemented adaptive resolution scaling to maintain performance without sacrificing visual quality.

features.title: Immersive VR Experience
features.description: Full 6DOF VR support with motion controller interaction.

features.title: Realistic Physics
features.description: Accurate planetary orbits based on NASA data.

features.title: Educational Content
features.description: Interactive lessons about each celestial body.

awards: Best Educational VR Experience - VR Awards 2022
